Karen and Scott are getting married!

July 11, 2015

Stonefire Station, Barboursville, VA

In August of 2014, Karen and Scott went on vacation to the mountains of North Carolina. After a day of whitewater rafting and ziplining through the forest canopy, Scott got down on one knee and proposed to Karen on the porch of their cabin.

The ceremony will take place at Stonefire Station in Barboursville, VA.

The reception will take place at Stonefire Station in Barboursville, VA.

Wedding Party

Groomspeople

  • Franny Yackso - Co-best Person
  • Peter Bonventre - Co-best Person

Bridal Party

  • Kathryn Tipton - Maid of Honor
  • Dan Galus
